title: Clash Question
body: so me and my mates have made a team but i am unavaiable on the saturday? would i still be able to play on day 2 even if we dont compete on the saturday? cheers {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
YOu can find more details here: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/help-us-test-clash-weekend

It's only a one day test this weekend not a full tournament, and everyone who participates will enter a single 4 team bracket (2 games max).

By normal clash rules the answer would be yes, but this time around it is only a one day test, so the most anyone will be playing is 2 games on Saturday. Unfortunately if you aren't available then (which alas, I am not either), you won't be able to participate in the Clash test.
